resources.string: Tux Paint needs storage access in order to save your drawings and to operate properly.

Press install to add the stamps to Tux Paint.
 If you changed the default data directory for Tux Paint you must reflect that change in the destination field. 
 Once the files are installed you could remove this installer to save space in your device.
 
 Press uninstall to remove the files added by this installer in the Tux Paint's installation.
 After that you could remove this installer.

 If you wish to add more stamps or to improve the sound descriptions for any language you are very welcome to do so.
 Please find us at http://tuxpaint.org/help
The files have been removed successfully.
There are not enough permissions to manage the stamps, please allow files management.\n\n If you denied them before, you might have to do so in the Android app settings.
